Description.Text: Hotel Bon Ami is a modern 4-star boutique property offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Kazan. Highlights include elegant interiors, free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and excellent transport links. Kazan is built on the intersection of two rivers and the city centre showcases a wealth of culture and history. Nearby places of interest include the Kazan Kremlin, All Religions Temple and Epiphany Church. Ploshchad Tukaya metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Kazan destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a smart facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are individually decorated with rich fabrics and dark wood furniture. They feature a sitting area with a sofa or comfortable chair. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The hotel restaurant offers a range of dishes. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
